name: My trusty dieing Pan
description:
The head chef was killed
NOW THEY WILL PAY
Use your trusty frying pan as the perfect tool for revenge, combined with your perfect reaction, to lay havocc over those who killed your beloved head chef.

To parry a projectile: Left Click
To throw the pan: Right Click
To slow time for a short while: Q
To pause the game: P
To restart the level: R

Controller not supported
